title: Is Lana Del Rey Dating This Celebrity Cop?
text:
Photo: Felipe Ramales / SplashNews.com

Lana Del Rey was spotted this weekend living out her suburban fantasies in Central Park with Sean Larkin, a self-described “full time popo” and “part time crossfitter” whose nickname is “Sticks.” In photos, the two appeared to be enjoying iced coffees together, Del Rey sporting her signature Maxxinista style and Larkin in high-top vans and a white tee.

Nothing else is known about their relationship except that they follow each other on Instagram, where Larkin appears to be a micro-influencer in the cop community, boasting some 163K followers. According to his social media, he is a host and analyst on a handful of cop shows (LivePD, PD Cam) where he gives “explanations on what officers are doing, why they are doing it, as well as policies and procedures and law.”

In addition to CrossFit, Larkin appears to be a fan of poker and whiskey, trucks, Tulsa, and being a cop, all of which perfectly complement Del Rey’s ruthless commitment to the Americana aesthetic. And while their relationship isn’t yet confirmed, he certainly checks all the right boxes for the singer, especially with this post:
description: Lana Del Rey was spotted with Sean Larkin, a self-described “popo” and Live PD host who loves Crossfit.
